DOC.brief_title: Study Asian Patients With Hypercholesterolaemia UK - Rosuvastatin 5mg Versus Atorvastatin 10mg
DOC.criteria: Self describe Asian , first second generation Male female > = 18 year primary hypercholesterolaemia . Use cholesterol lower drug visit 1 Homozygous familial hypercholesterolaemia Active arterial disease within 3 month study entry Poorly control diabetes Uncontrolled hypothyroidism Active liver disease History alcoh/drug abuse .
